name: Shelga, the Tri-Warlord
effectText: The shockwaves of powerful battles have warped reality, allowing the proud valiant to emerge from the Dimensional Sea.
pendEffect: Once per turn: You can banish 3 Psychic-Type Pendulum Monsters you control, then target 1 Pendulum Monster you control; if it attacks your opponent directly and reduces their LP to 0 this turn, you win the Match.
